NAME: Parveen Chahal
ABOUT: Experienced Software Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in the computer software industry. Skilled in Java, JavaScript, Python, C, C++, and Programming. Strong engineering professional with a Bachelor’s Degree focused in B.E. (Computer Science) from Chitkara University.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
Enable and modernize your digital workplace.
Provide a leading-edge mobile-first user experience through a comprehensive suite of micro apps without “ripping and replacing” your legacy backend systems. Capabilities such as offline sync and plug and play integration with SAP Business Suite enables our suite of apps to reduce call center, payroll, and administrative costs while improving employee productivity and data integrity.

The Kony Sales for CPG app streamlines field processes and increases team efficiency by accelerating sales execution and properly measuring performance. It provides a centralized application to access valuable information to optimize standard processes, such as route management, on-site visit scheduling & management, and sales procedures, so field reps can visit more customers and maximize the effectiveness of each visit.
